name: h3
description: Introducing the 2025 Easton MAV1 BBCOR Baseball Bat, engineered for peak performance with a balanced swing feel that enhances every player's game. This bat boasts a Drop 3 length-to-weight ratio, ensuring optimal control and power at the plate. Certified by BBCOR, the MAV1 features a 2 5/8 inch barrel diameter and is crafted with Extra Long Draw Alloy Processing, resulting in a 7% thinner wall for a larger sweet spot. The innovative MAV HP Alloy provides an ultra-balanced swing weight, while the sleek taper handle allows for superior barrel control, making this bat a game-changer for serious athletes. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included.
